name: Disrobe
description:
Follow the orders of the women on your screen. If you're good enough at satisfying them, they may undress for you...

The prototype was made during the Game, Sun & Jam organized by Game IN. The theme was : "Obey must be a pleasure"

Team : Mathieu Barbier, Antoine Pacciani, Clément Saint-Jean et Maxime Chauvin.
